name: CubyDuby
description:
CubyDuby is a game where you try to complete as many levels as possible. you have two different game modes. you can play the storyline or endless game mode.

in the storyline you are a cuby and your family has been kidnapped.

try to find your family with the help of a friend. along the way you will encounter all kinds of enemies that you must defeat by shooting them to pieces.

in the endless mode you can play endlessly. by killing enemies you get points where you can buy new characters and with that you can play in that game mode.

controls
jump: w
right: d
left: a
shoot: button on screen
